greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = Sum_{d|n} möbius(d)^(n/d).
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: Sum_{k=1..n} a(k) ~ 3*n / Pi^2 * (log(n) - 1 + 2*gamma - log(2) - 12*Zeta'(2)/Pi^2), where gamma is the Euler-Mascheroni constant A001620. - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Feb 02 2019
G.f.: Sum_{k>=1} mu(k)*x^k/(1 - mu(k)*x^k). - _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, May 23 2019
mathematica: Table[Sum[MoebiusMu[d]^(n/d), {d, Divisors@ n}], {n, 87}] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Nov 25 2015 *)
program: a264782 n = sum $ zipWith (^) (map a008683 divs) (reverse divs)
(Perl) use ntheory ":all"; sub a264782 { my $n=shift; divisor_sum($n, sub { moebius($_[0]) ** ($n/$_[0]) }); } # _Dana Jacobsen_, Dec 29 2015
results.author: _Gevorg Hmayakyan_, Nov 24 2015
